forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the night blankets Downtown San Francisco, a shroud of clouds settles over the city, enveloping it in a soft embrace. The air is cool, whispering hints of the chill that will accompany dawn, while the gentle west wind stirs the night, carrying with it the familiar scents of the bay. As the morning unfolds, the clouds will disperse, allowing a faint sprinkle of sun to break through, casting a delicate light over the iconic structures of the city. While the temperatures rise slowly, they may hover around the mid-fifties, inviting residents to don light jackets against the lingering coolness, especially as the winds shift and blow through the streets.

This transitional day, with its partly sunny disposition, brings with it an ideal opportunity to wander the quieter corners of the city. Perhaps explore a local café, steaming cup in hand, savoring the comforts of the morning while watching the world gently awaken. For the adventurous, a stroll along the waterfront promises stunning views of the Golden Gate, perhaps kissed by a few playful tendrils of fog. Though the marine layer may linger, obscuring some of the more distant views, today holds a promise of enchantment, inviting you to revel in the understated charm of San Francisco's neighborhood streets.
